flawed_nl_solution:
Sylvia got 50/5 = <<50/5=10>>10 incorrect answers.
This means she got 50 - 10 = <<50-10=40>>40 correct answers.
Sergio got 50 - 4 = <<50-4=44>>44 correct answers.
So, Sergio got 44 - 40 = <<44-40=4>>4 more correct answers than Sylvia.
